name: Pizza Purist
description:
Pizza Purist is a fun and addictive mobile game that allows players to become a pizza chef and create mouth-watering pizzas to sell to hungry customers.

As the game progresses, players must master the art of pizza-making by learning recipes, balancing ingredients, and upgrading their pizzeria with new kitchen tools and decor. With fast-paced gameplay, Pizza Purist is perfect for anyone who loves cooking and wants to test their skills in a fast-paced and enjoyable way.

So put on your chef's hat and get ready to serve up some delicious pizzas customers won't be able to resist!
developers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
